resources.string: Welcome to Romuald Halasz\'s implementation of the Payconiq assignment. The app monitors network connectivity changes and updates the main interface accordingly.

Scroll to the bottom of the list to load additional items. Items are loaded 15 at a time and they are cross-checked with offline data. If a repository item is not stored locally, it is saved so it can be viewed in offline mode.
Cached repository records. If no records have been previously downloaded, no items will be visible.
